1.name: Lagna/Ascendant
1.description: The self, physical body, personality, and how one is perceived by the world. The foundation of the entire chart.

2.name: Dhana
2.description: Accumulated wealth, family lineage, speech and communication style, food habits, and personal values.

3.name: Sahaja
3.description: Courage, younger siblings, communication skills, short travels, artistic abilities, and self-effort.

4.name: Sukha
4.description: Mother, home environment, emotional security, vehicles, landed property, formal education, and inner happiness.

5.name: Putra
5.description: Children, creative intelligence, romance, spiritual practices, past life merits (purva punya), and speculative gains.

6.name: Ari/Shatru
6.description: Enemies, diseases, debts, service, obstacles, litigation, and the capacity to overcome adversity through effort.

7.name: Kalatra
7.description: Marriage partner, all forms of partnership, public image, foreign connections, and the nature of desire and relationships.

8.name: Randhra/Ayu
8.description: Longevity, transformation, sudden upheavals, occult knowledge, inheritance, hidden matters, and the mysteries of life and death.

9.name: Dharma/Bhagya
9.description: Father, guru, fortune, dharma, higher philosophy, religious devotion, long-distance travel, and divine grace.

10.name: Karma
10.description: Career, profession, public status, authority, government relations, fame, and one's actions and impact in the world.

11.name: Labha
11.description: Gains, income from profession, elder siblings, friendships, social circles, aspirations, and the fulfillment of desires.

12.name: Vyaya
12.description: Losses, expenses, foreign residence, spiritual liberation, isolation, sleep, dreams, and the final dissolution of worldly attachments.

1.name: Aries
1.description: Dynamic, pioneering, assertive, competitive, courageous, impulsive

2.name: Taurus
2.description: Stable, sensual, resourceful, patient, materialistic, pleasure-loving

3.name: Gemini
3.description: Communicative, intellectual, versatile, curious, adaptable, dual-natured

4.name: Cancer
4.description: Nurturing, emotional, protective, intuitive, domestic, receptive

5.name: Leo
5.description: Regal, creative, authoritative, generous, proud, dramatic

6.name: Virgo
6.description: Analytical, detail-oriented, service-minded, discriminating, practical, health-conscious

7.name: Libra
7.description: Balanced, diplomatic, aesthetic, relationship-oriented, just, harmonious

8.name: Scorpio
8.description: Intense, transformative, secretive, powerful, investigative, deep

9.name: Sagittarius
9.description: Philosophical, optimistic, expansive, righteous, adventurous, teaching

10.name: Capricorn
10.description: Ambitious, disciplined, structured, practical, hardworking, status-conscious

11.name: Aquarius
11.description: Humanitarian, innovative, detached, intellectual, unconventional, community-oriented

12.name: Pisces
12.description: Spiritual, compassionate, intuitive, imaginative, dissolving, transcendent
